title: How do I cut or copy files or folders from the phone's
answer:
Single File or Folder   
 Touch File Manager. In the displayed list, touch and hold the file or folder you want to cut or   
 copy. In the Folder options menu, touch Cut or Copy. Touch SD card then Paste.   
 Multiple Files or Folders   
 Touch File Manager then or , select the files or folders you want to cut or copy, and touch Cut or Copy. Touch SD card then Paste.

 .![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924105002519001.png)
